settings.DetermineSlotsHint: How does the game determine a character's maximum slots?
settings.BaseSlotValueHint: Not used if an ability score is used as the base!
settings.CoinsPerSlotHint: How many coins (of any denomination) fit in one inventory slot?
settings.ShowNotifyHint: Display notifications to the players when they try to carry, hold, or wear too much?
settings.MvCalcTypeHint: BASIC calculates speed based on armor alone, DETAILED uses slots filled to determine speed
settings.MvConfigHint: Set the thresholds of slots filled for movement speeds (DETAILED only)
settings.CountEquippedHint: Choose if the slot value of carried or worn items counts toward encumbrance

messages.TooManyHeldItemsMessage: This character does not have enough hands to hold this many items.
messages.TooMuchArmorMessage: This character cannot wear more than one suit of armor!
messages.EncumberedWarningMessage: This character is encumbered and has a movement speed of 0.
